data.title: Larry Miller Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Larry Miller on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Larry Miller including 10 Things I Hate About You, Pretty Woman, and more.
data.text:
Palestinian Chicken

Larry plays 'social assassin' to the hilt at a dinner party, on the golf course, and at a Palestinian restaurant with chicken to die for.

Color and Light

Gabrielle revisits her past when old friends come to town, and the Scavos learn more about the new neighbors.

Head Cases

When name partner Edwin Poole shows up to a staff meeting without pants, visiting attorney Brad Chase is asked to stay on at the Boston branch of Crane, Poole & Schmidt to keep Denny Crane inÂ check.

Newborn King

After a Navy Captain is murdered in his hotel room, the NCIS team has to find his pregnant companion and protect her from unknown assailants. Meanwhile, Jimmy brings his future father-in-law to work.
